column1: Uchi////If I had only a few hours left on this planet Uchi would be my last meal. This is by far one of the best dining establishments that I have ever had the opportunity to visit. What makes Uchi so exceptional is the flavor combinations they are able to produce and the level of artistry in presentation. One feels as if they are a guest judge on the show Iron Chef as the server gracefully explains each component of the dish as it is presented at the table. Here is what we tried:
